ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] You just sent me 2 klez worm
ygData.msgSnippet: there is a much cheaper way, than using any antivirus software: use a proper email program ... :-) That s the dumbest thing i ever heard. ... From: Biltilie
ygData.messageBody:
"there is a much cheaper way, than using any antivirus software: use a
proper email program ... :-)"

That's the dumbest thing i ever heard.



-----Original Message-----
From: Biltilie Dwimmerlaik [mailto:biltilie@...]
Sent: den 24 oktober 2002 18:19
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] You just sent me 2 klez worm


On 24 Oct 2002 at 0:20, Thomas H. Comegys wrote:

> I just got two messages with the Klez worm in them too (three cheers
> for Norton Antivirus). The way that thing works is that the person
> [...]
> In other words, Klez picks a name at random from the address book of
> an infected computer and uses thatnamefor the FROM header.

there is a much cheaper way, than using any antivirus software: use a
proper email program ... :-)

i use "Pegasus Mail" (http://www.pmail.com/) it is freeware and imho
is a very good email client for windows. i prefer to use it for email
addresses where i know i will get much spam and the chances are
pretty good for viruses.


- bilt
